body.name: Oars + Alps Moisturizing Men's Bar Soap, Dermatologist Tested and Made with Clean Ingredients, TSA Approved, 1 Pack, 6 Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 21 mins
features: DEEPLY MOISTURIZING AND HYDRATING SOAP: Deeply hydrate while you cleanse with Shea Butter and Jojoba oil. Crushed Juniper Berries add a little extra scrub.

FEEL GOOD ABOUT WHAT YOU'RE PUTTING ON YOUR SKIN: Our moisturizing Soap Bar is made with premium clean ingredients. It's Dermatologist tested and free of glycol, parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and animal cruelty.

INGREDIENTS: Handcrafted Shea Butter provides intense moisture for dry and dehydrated skin while cleaning your body. Crushed juniper berries sourced from the mountains of the U.S. Pacific Northwest mildly buff away dead skin cells to provide ultimate cleanliness.
FOCUS ON SUSTAINABILITY: Amazonian Clay sourced from the Amazon Rainforest helps remove skin impurities and detoxifies; Larch tree extract creates a barrier on the skin to help lock in moisture.
body.description: Product Description Deeply moisturizing and hydrating Alps Bar with Alpine Caribou Moss and Organic, Fair Trade, handcrafted Shea Butter provides intense moisture for dry and dehydrated skin while cleaning your body. Crushed juniper berries sourced from the mountains of the U.S.’s Pacific Northwest mildly buff away dead skin cells providing ultimate cleanliness. Amazonian Clay sourced from the Amazon Rainforest helps remove skin impurities and detoxifies. Larch tree extract creates a barrier on the skin to help lock in moisture. Free from glycol, parabens, phthalates, sulfate and animal cruelty. TSA-approved and travel-friendly making it perfect for when you're on-the-go. Proudly made in the USA. brand_description We create natural, powerful skin care products without any toxins. We've engineered and tested products that work as hard as you do. The result? Powerful, natural, non-toxic, TSA-approved skin care at a price point that suits.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alps Bar Body Wash Oars Bar Hand Cream Aluminum Free Deodorant SPF 50 Spray Benefits Packed with powerful natural ingredients to provide intense hydration for dry and dehydrated skin Packed with Antioxidants and Vitamin E to intensely moisturize your skin. Purge skin of dead skin cells, sweat, bacteria, and excess oil with exfoliating Blue Charcoal, Volcanic Sand and Blue Green Algae. Crafted with 20% Shea Butter and vitamin-packed Coconut and Sunflower oils to deeply hydrate and heal dry hands. Moisturizing and non-greasy. Goes on clear and won't cause pit stains. Free of aluminum, alcohol and baking soda. Light, non-greasy and reff friendly formula infused with Vitamin C to strengthen, hydrate and brighten your skin while protecting you from harmful UV rays Key Ingredients Shea Butter, Alpine Caribou Moss, Juniper Berries, Rainforest Certified Palm Oil Aloe Vera, Jojoba Oil, and Vitamin E Shea Butter, Witch Hazel Extract, Alpine Caribou Moss, Volcanic Sand, Blue Green Algae, and Activated Charcoal Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Sunflower Oil, and Alpine Caribou Moss Aloe Vera, Alpine Caribou Moss, and Corn Starch Vitamin C, Alpine Caribou Moss, and Olive Leaf Extract Application Wet soap, massage into wet skin, wash off with water Apply a quarter-size amount of product to hand or loofah. Apply to wet skin. Rinse completely. Wet soap, massage into wet skin to remove dead skin cells, wash off with water Apply to clean hands and massage into extra dry areas Apply to underarms as needed While holding the can about 6 inches from your body, spray all over from your neck to your toes Skin Types All All All All All All Free From Free of alcohol, parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and talc. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hubby loves it
reviews.reviewText: Hubby loves it, great exfoliating and great lather. And a great manly scent :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting scent
reviews.reviewText: I like this soap a lot. It's nice and moisturizing and the scent actually lingers. I've had several premium soaps that smell good until you finish toweling off and then you can't smell them anymore.This one actually lasts.As for the scent, that's always subjective. I like woodsy scents and this certainly has that, but it's not my favorite.Not sure if I'll get it again or try another scent. But this good soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice big size, premium quality, and good scent
reviews.reviewText: This is a great soap. It smells good and leaves my skin feeling clean. Even though it's expensive, it's nice and big so feels like a good value for the money. Plus, it is really fancy looking, which is a big difference than the bar soap I've used in the past.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is some amazing smelling soap! Lathers very well and moisturizes your skin as well.I just wish it was cheap but I will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars For the price, this soap should definitely last more than 12-15 days.
reviews.reviewText: While I enjoy this soap for the most part, the scent is almost overwhelming. It’s borderline soapy and perfumey. I’ve only had it for 9 days and it’s down to the point of breaking in half (i.e.- almost gone) and I haven’t even used it all 9 days in a row. For the price, this bar of soap should definitely last more than 12-15 days total. Won’t be purchasing again and will try out other brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This white bar along with the oars and alps deep cleaning bar are the perfect 1, 2 combo to have in your shower. I switch between each bar every day and nothing else that I've tried comes close to the feeling I get when I step out of the shower. This soap gives a deep clean while also moisturizing your skin and to top it off, smells amazing while doing so. Worth every penny in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great soap, not as expensive as other bars but still pricey
reviews.reviewText: Great scent, moisturizing, exfoliating and long lasting for me. Just wish it was 8oz, at least.
